title: About kayle
body: Why don't they just make her a ranged champion and like she uses her e to DO additional damage.{{champion:10}}

replies.body: If she is just all ranged then she would rather be too strong to even trade in lanes. Having her melee form is what gives opponents opportunity to counter her. I think she is perfect the way she is now.
The fact that Kayle is both melee and ranged is what makes her unique.

A champ that powerful needs downtime for counterplay.

Being melee is her downtime.

it would make her a lot more plain than she is now. Late game the cooldown is so small that you could have it up 24/7 if you wanted to and had the mana to spare. I like it because it makes it more difficult in the early game to bully the enemy out of lane. Imagine all that poke...

Personally I want a return of Support Kayle but I have no idea how that could be done.
